channel.title: Award on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Award on ZAP

item.title: ZAP Wins Inaugural DefectDojo Award for Open-Source Cybersecurity
item.description: ZAP was recognised as being one of the best dynamic application security testing (DAST) Tools.

item.title: OWASP Outstanding Project 2021
item.description: ZAP has been awarded the 2021 Waspy Award for Outstanding Project, as selected by OWASP Members.
